items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for October 21, 2025
items.description: The cursed love life of a kitchen witch, a family of Philadelphia clairvoyants, a crew of clones on a spaceship, and more of today's best book deals

items.title: A Buffet of Bookish Goodness
items.description: Take your pick from long reads about Jane Austen, Dostoevsky, Shakespeare, and more. Plus: Hamlet gets the Zero to Well-Read treatment.

items.title: A Must-Read Literary Speculative Fiction Collection
items.description: This is one of the strongest short story collections I've read to date, and it debuted a powerful new voice in literary spec fic.

items.title: We’re in a Book Affordability Crisis
items.description: The death of the mass market paperback means the cheapest book options are now 50% more expensive. Welcome to the book affordability crisis.

items.title: Thought-Provoking Horror to Read With Your Book Club
items.description: There's Indigenous revenge, a particularly nauseating dystopian, and fighters who battle certain hood-wearing racist demons in the South.
